interpro.desc: Vertebrate heat shock transcription factor, C-terminal domain

name: heat shock transcription factor 1

reactome.name: Regulation of HSF1-mediated heat shock response

summary: The product of this gene is a transcription factor that is rapidly induced after temperature stress and binds heat shock promoter elements (HSE). This protein plays a role in the regulation of lifespan. Expression of this gene is repressed by phosphorylation, which promotes binding by heat shock protein 90. [provided by RefSeq, Jul 2017].
